enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable or disable the entire addon.

hvenable.name: Houseban enable
hvenable.description: Enable or disable the display of the houseban status next to player names.

hvprefix.name: Houseban prefix
hvprefix.description: Set the prefix for displaying players with housebans.

breadenable.name: Breadlist enable
breadenable.description: Enable or disable the display of players on the breadlist next to their names.

breadprefix.name: Breadlist prefix
breadprefix.description: Set the prefix for displaying players on the breadlist.

drinkmessageenable.name: Drink message enable
drinkmessageenable.description: Enable or disable the chat message when you are thirsty.

drinksoundenable.name: Drink Sound enable
drinksoundenable.description: Enable or disable the sound when you are thirsty.

aequip.usage: §8 - §b /aequip <Wasser/Brot> {Anzahl} §8 -> §7Equip yourself automatically with bread or water

error.number: §cPlease selct a number that is not higher than 5 and not lower than 1.

sync.pending: §7The bread list is being synchronized! This may take a few seconds!

help.main: §8 - §b/brot §8-> §7Synchronize the bread list with the client..
help.list: §8 - §b/brot list §8-> §7Display a list of all players who have received bread.
help.info: §8 - §b/brot info <User> §8-> Display bread information for the player.
help.add: §8 - §b/brot add <User> §8-> Add a player to the breadlist.

error.namelenght: §cThe name must not be longer than 16 characters!
error.nospace: §cThere was not enough soace in the bread table!
error.nopermission: §cYou do not have permissions for the bread table

updatenames.owngmailerror: §cYou need to have ownGmail enabled in the config for this function!

sync.pending: §aChecking the donation list for errors. This may take some time.

checkdonation.sync: §7Die Loading the donations. This may take some time!
checkdonation.nodonation: §cNo entries found that need to be added!

sync.pending: §7The house bans are being synchronized! This may take a few seconds!

help.main: §8- §b/hv §8-> §7Synchronize the house bans with the client.
help.list: §8- §b/hv list §8-> §7Display a list of all players who have a house ban.
help.namecheck: §8- §b/hv namecheck §8-> §7Check for errors in the entered player names..
help.info: §8- b/hv info <User> §8-> §7Show house ban information for the player.

namecheck.sync: §7NameCheck in progress! This may take a few seconds!
namecheck.nochanges: §8- No player found with incorrect names found!

add.error: §cThe name must not be longer than 16 characters!
add.nospace: §c Not enough space found in the house ban table!
add.nopermissions: §cYou do not have permissions for the house ban table.

error.owngmail: §cYou need to have ownGmail enabled in the config for this function!
error.needtoken: §cYou need a KirchePlus token for your current upload type.
error.serverdown: §cThe connection to upload.KirchePlus-Mod.de cannot be established!
error.fix: §cReport this to a leader and switch to Imgur in the mod settings for now.
error.tokeninvalid: §cYour token has expired or is invalid.

saveactivty.screenupload: §9Screenshot is being uploaded. This may take a while!

help.info: §8 - §b/contractinfo info §8-> §7Displays informations about contracts the church has.
help.faction: §8 - §b/contractinfo <faction> §8-> §7Displays detailed informations about the specific contract.
help.main: §8 - §b/contractinfo §8-> §7Displays this list and updates the list.

save.screenshoterror: §cThe screenshot could not be uploaded! Please try again!
save.errornotfound: §eThe error was not found. Restarting the game will fix this.
save.noplacefound: §cNot enough space found in your activity record!

kircheplusaddon.update: §8[§6Kirche-Plus§8] §eAn update has been found. Download it from the KirchePlus-Mod website!
